entry.title: Attention
entry.summary:
Author: LicoricexWitch

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,458Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 160

Summary: You've always been obsessed with superheroes, ever since you were a little kid. You moved to Gotham all alone with stars in your eyes for undergrad before the cold reality of city-living set in. The streets were mean and people weren't as kind as they were back home. It was hard to make friends and you preferred to stay inside, making you even lonelier. You were a regular fish out of water, not a lot of close friends or family, living all alone--the perfect target for someone with not-so-nice intentions. They always said not to meet your heroes because they could never live up to your expectations. Or sometimes, they weren't a hero at all.

entry.title: Loving Machine
entry.summary:
Author: Spenc56623

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,029Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: After a long night of work, getting home and finally relaxing, the one and only Red Hood falls into your apartment. Thinking it is his safe house, he is confused why you're here but when you notice him bleeding, your nurse instincts take over. Ignoring your fear, you patch him up. He leaves with A promise, threat, or warning, maybe even all three, that he will be back at some point in time.

entry.title: The Black Sheep's Reckoning
entry.summary:
Author: Noot_Noot_34

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,028Chapters: 26/26Kudos: 5

Summary: Jason Todd’s life is already complicated — smugglers in the Narrows, Bat‑Family breathing down his neck, and scars that never let him forget the Joker. Then Vice shows up: sharp knives, sharper banter, and zero respect for boundaries. What follows is chaos in every flavor — rooftop silences, bad puns in the cave, coded ledgers, collapsing scaffolds, and Joker’s laughter bleeding back into Gotham. Somewhere between mistrust and survival, Jason has to figure out if he’s still the reckless Red Hood… or something else entirely. And through it all, Gotham keeps bleeding — with Jason and you tangled in the middle, fighting side‑by‑side, even when neither of them is sure what that really means...

entry.title: futile devices
entry.summary:
Author: al_lion_e

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,930Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 109

Summary: “That’s gonna get infected.” Comes a voice from down the alley, cold and disinterested. You freeze, and look up. “Oh.” “I mean,” says a man in a recognizable red helmet, “unless you disinfect it. Gothams dumpsters carry germs scientists haven’t even discovered.” He's leaning against the brick wall to your right near the entrance of the alley, his broad, intimidating figure literally blotting out the lights beyond. It's strange to see him so close up- in person, not in blurry photographs in magazines, or on the news.   Or: Encounters.
